summary: Agatha All Along is a spin-off series from the popular Marvel show, WandaVision. It follows the character Agatha Harkness, played by Kathryn Hahn, and is set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The show's development began in 2021, and filming took place in Atlanta and Los Angeles from January to May 2023. The series will be released in two parts, with the first two episodes premiering on Disney+ on September 18, 2024, and the remaining episodes released weekly until October 30.
title: Agatha All Along (miniseries)
